author: Vaish
text:
People will always judge you, no matter what you do!
So stop thinking what people think about you!

author: Vaish
text:
The whole country is developing...... the whole system is improving...... This is all because the present government is bringing the change!

author: Vaish
text:
Every school has a uniform so that the students seem to be equal irrespective of their religion or caste or anything.......
Taking this into a wrong direction is not good for anyone!
There should only be uniforms to be worn in the schools!
#BanHijab
